subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rookie Ryan Carter scored his first two N.H.L. goals Friday, both in the first period, and the Anaheim Ducks held off the Devils, 2-1, at the Prudential Center in Newark.
snippet: The rookie Ryan Carter scored his first two N.H.L. goals Friday, both in the first period, and the Anaheim Ducks held off the Devils, 2-1, at the Prudential Center in Newark.
